thread.title: Houston's Clowney out with ankle injury
thread.title_full: Houston's Clowney out with ankle injury

author: Stunning details in Lamar Odom brothel incident
title: Houston's Clowney out with ankle injury
text:
Houston's Clowney out with ankle injury Associated Press 2 hrs ago Â© (AP Photo/Patric Schneider, File FILE - In this Sept. 27, 2015, file photo, Houston Texans outside linebacker Jadeveon Clowney (90) is shown before an NFL football game against Tampa in Houston. Clowney is finally healthy and playing well for the Texans. But there's something missing for the outside linebacker. Seven games into his NFL career the pass rusher still hasn't gotten a sack. (AP Photo/Patric Schneider, File) HOUSTON (AP) Houston Texans outside linebacker Jadeveon Clowney is out for Sunday's game against Jacksonville with an ankle injury.
AdChoices Clowney injured his right ankle before halftime in Houston's loss to the Colts on Oct. 8, but returned after missing only a couple of plays. The Texans hoped he would be ready for this game, but ruled him out on Friday after he missed practice all week.
The top overall draft pick last year has appeared in each game for the Texans this season with four starts. He has 12 tackles, three passes defensed and has forced a fumble, but has yet to get his first NFL sack.
He played just four games as a rookie because of various injuries before having season-ending microfracture surgery on his right knee in December.
---
